name: flossing
content:
flossing noun [U]
(TEETH)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the practice of cleaning between your teeth using dental floss: Regular flossing is essential for healthy gums.

flossing noun [U]
(BEHAVIOUR)
US slang behaviour that is intended to attract attention or admiration: Stop your flossing - nobody cares about your clothes.

flossing noun [U]
(DANCE)
a type of dancing that involves swinging your arms in front of and behind your body in the opposite direction to your hips. It became popular on the internet: The latest dance craze is known as flossing.
